Name: [Hollow] Battle Spinner
Desc: Each Corruption increases all squad member's attack DMG by <color=#2BAD00>5%</color>. (Current boost: {CReplaceCardParam:DamageShow_1001020,0.01,2}%)
Desc2: The winner earns a prize: the loser's Battle Spinner. Remove a component from the upper side of the top to add it to your own!
